18using System.Collections;
19using UnityEngine;
20
21namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
22{
26 public class Chisel : MonoBehaviour
27 {
31 public GameObject hammer;
35 public Material material;
39 public GameObject prefab = null;
43 private float reenableTime = 1;
44
48 public SteamVR_Action_Boolean actionIndicate = SteamVR_Input.GetAction<SteamVR_Action_Boolean>("instrument", "Indicate");
49
53 private Interactable interactable;
54
58 private void Start()
59 {
60 interactable = transform.parent.GetComponent<Interactable>();
61 }
62
66 void Update()
67 {
68 if (!interactable.attachedToHand) return;
69 SteamVR_Input_Sources hand = interactable.attachedToHand.handType;
70
71 if (actionIndicate.GetStateDown(hand))
72 {
73 gameObject.GetComponent<MeshRenderer>().enabled = true;
74 }
75
76 if (actionIndicate.GetStateUp(hand))
77 {
78 gameObject.GetComponent<MeshRenderer>().enabled = false;
79 }
80 }
81
86 void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
87 {
88 if (!gameObject.GetComponent<MeshRenderer>().enabled) return;
89 if (other.gameObject != hammer) return;
90
91 GameObject hit = Instantiate(prefab, transform.parent.position, transform.rotation);
92
93 hit.transform.parent = null;
94 hit.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.15f, 0.15f, 0.15f);
95 hit.GetComponent<Renderer>().material = material;
96
97 GameManager manager = FindObjectOfType<GameManager>();
98 if (manager.loadedPatient == null) return;
99
100 hit.transform.parent = manager.loadedPatient.transform;
101 manager.GetComponent<CaseController>().AddStep(hit);
102 }
103
107 void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
108 {
109 if (other.gameObject != hammer) return;
110
111 gameObject.GetComponent<BoxCollider>().enabled = false;
112 StartCoroutine(ActivateRoutine(reenableTime));
113 }
114
118 private IEnumerator ActivateRoutine(float time)
119 {
120 yield return new WaitForSeconds(time);
121 gameObject.GetComponent<BoxCollider>().enabled = true;
122 }
123 }
124}

The time in seconds to wait before re-enabling the chisel's collider after it is deactivated (to prev...
